events.title: NVIDIA AI Summit India 2024

events.description: Nebius is excited to support the AI x Cancer Bio Hackathon hosted by CRUK Cambridge Centre.

events.title: World AI Cannes Festival
events.description: The unique global event bringing together organizations and individuals to explore how AI will shape the future of business and of our society.

events.title: Nebius AI: a new cloud platform powered by NVIDIA® H100 GPUs
events.description: Recraft’s founder and CEO Anna Veronika Dorogush, and our experts Andrew and Levon will highlight the platform’s features and capabilities.

events.title: NVIDIA GTC
events.description: NVIDIA GTC is the developer conference for the era of AI.

events.title: Webinar: Slurm vs K8s for large model training
events.description: Join us to explore Slurm and Kubernetes, covering their architecture, design, original purposes, and adaptations for ML.

events.title: Webinar. Accelerating AI innovation with cloud-based training & inference
events.description: As the demand for powerful AI models continues to rise, so do the challenges in scaling, managing and deploying these systems effectively. In this webinar, we will discuss the everyday challenges of ML engineers and their requirements for an AI cloud.

events.title: MLOps Meetup on April 11
events.description: Are you interested in MLOps and based in Amsterdam? Then, join the Amsterdam MLOps Community meetup co-hosted by us on April 11th at Strandzuid bar.

events.title: AIAI San Jose
events.description: AIAI San Jose bridges the gap between cutting edge research & value-driving application for developers, engineering teams & AI executives.

events.title: Data Innovation Summit
events.description: The largest and most influential annual Data and AI event in the Nordics and beyond, bringing together the enterprise practitioners, technology providers, start-up innovators and academics — everyone who works with data.

events.title: International conference on learning representations
events.description: ICLR 2024 is globally renowned for presenting and publishing cutting-edge research on all aspects of deep learning used in the fields of artificial intelligence, statistics and data science, as well as important application areas such as machine vision, computational biology, speech recognition, text understanding, gaming and robotics.

events.title: Deploying a knowledge-based chatbot with RAG in production
events.description: Join our hands-on webinar to explore the deployment of a knowledge-based chatbot using RAG in a production environment.

events.title: Mistral AI Paris Hackathon
events.description: Our friends Mistral AI is holding a hackathon in Paris, and we’re thrilled to provide GPUs for their first hackathon in Europe!

events.title: MLOps Podcast: Handling Multi-Terabyte LLM Checkpoints
events.description: The talk provides a gentle introduction to the topic of LLM checkpointing: why is it hard, and how big are the checkpoints?

events.title: The AI Summit London
events.description: A two-day conference and all-round immersive experience that celebrates emerging and transformative AI technologies.

events.title: Decoding GPU pricing — tips from a CFO

events.title: LLM Armenian Summer School
events.description: We are happy to support the first Armenian LLM Summer School that offers a series of workshops, lectures, and hands-on sessions, aiming to bridge the knowledge gap among members of academia and industry in the fast-developing research area of foundational large language models.

events.title: Taming AI or how we build the alignment pipeline
events.description: Webinar by LLMOps.Space with Maksim Nekrashevich, ML & LLM Engineer at Nebius AI.  The session is dedicated to key aspects of aligning LLMs and explores how to set up the necessary infrastructure to maintain a versatile alignment pipeline.
